description:
It`s finally the day of the cultural festival.  Shuichi and his classmates are busy preparing for the play.  Unlike Saori, who looks great in her Romeo costume, Makoto is uneasy about how he looks in his Juliet costume.  As the clock ticks down to the performance, there`s all sorts of excitement around the cultural festival as everyone ends up in the haunted house to calm their nerves, there`s a huge fuss as people find out that the popular model, Maiko-chan, is here, and even Yuki-san and Shi-chan show up.  And finally, the curtain rises on class 1-3`s genderbent play, Romeo and Juliet――
Source: crunchyroll
